QuestData.Title: Rolling in the Screech
QuestData.Description:
<You pull a scrap of parchment from the gooey, blood-soaked satchel of the Roc-Muncher. All you can make out is imagery of harpies devouring large eggs.
You're positive the thick, unintelligible scratch marks will make plenty of sense to your favorite senior ornithologist, Harleen Chirpsnide.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Screechflight Scroll to Harleen Chirpsnide in the Bluefeather Cliffs.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the Screechflight Scroll to Harleen Chirpsnide in the Bluefeather Cliffs.
QuestData.RewardText:
Ho, now! That's certainly no dinner menu you're holding!
Or maybe it is...
